香港人唔掂喇

Hong Kong MTR (The Mass Transit Railway) is a major public transport network serving Hong Kong citizens. It should be a neutral and independent corporation but regarding recent issues, in connection with assisting Hong Kong government to suppress protests, reveal that MTR has been politized and government-controlled instead of operating independently.

On the night of 21 July, a group of gangsters in white shirts stormed into rural MTR station, Yuen Long station, and assaulted train passengers with pipes, poles and other objects. Passengers had sought help from regional police force but were abandoned. This incident, also called Yuen Long terrorist Attack, eventually left at least 45 people injured. There is an outrageous point causing the attack that the driver had told passengers left the carriage and suspended to close the doors of carriage after the train arrived Yuen Long station. Such a move allowed those gangsters to have enough time to attack innocent people outside the train.

On 13/8 , In Kwai Chung station, protesters began gathering at the police station at around 9pm,. Some protesters hurled projectiles at the building, but retreated when riot police arrived. As protesters moved towards the Kwai Fong MTR station, police officers gave chase. In an unprecedented move, officers entered the station and fired tear gas into the paid concourse area, in contravention of the tear gas manufacturer’s warnings. A few days later, there was another similar incident happened in Tai Koo station, A Hong Kong police officer was seen shooting pepper balls at close range against protesters on Sunday as protestors were leaving the scene via Tai Koo MTR station. On 23 and 24 August, Hong Kong MTR shuts 4 stations and 3 stations around legal protest in Kwun Tong and Tusen Wan respectively. The move comes after days of pressure from Chinese state media outlets, who accuse the transit firm of assisting anti-government protesters.

There were signs that, MTR as a private corporation, seemingly assisted in police force and gangs to trap and beat up protestors, as well as to repress legal protest. Passenger safety is the priority in railways operations in Hong Kong, and even the world. Obviously, MTR is a failed in independence and unneutral private corporation which was suspected of being politized and becoming “a public-private corporation”( it means a private corporation controlled by totalitarian Hong Kong government).

Indeed, Hong Kong government is the biggest shareholder of MTR Corporation owning 76.28% in share proportion. In other words, Hong Kong government gets absolute power to control MTR. If that’s the case, MTR is actually granted to suppress protest activities for facilitating Hong Kong police force’s action, as to suppress protest. As the same time, MTR avoids compensating for injured passengers, from a perspective of law, has no responsibilities to take.






陳雲：香港幫助中共輸出極權政府的公司治理，這一點勞煩大家廣傳，告訴國際社會知道，也令港鐵的股東知道目前的港鐵營運風格是妨害盈利和信譽的。港鐵公司近日的行為，是失敗的獨立公營機構，是香港新自由主義的極權面目露出。 港鐵公司最大的股東是香港政府，持股比率是75.28%。在最近處理示威群眾的做法，停開列車、中斷服務、關閉站頭、容許黑幫進入車廂毆打市民、容許警察闖入發射催淚化學毒藥，港鐵被人看來有助警察和黑幫圍困及毆打人民，妨礙乘客安全，這不是中立的交通公司應有的服務，而是一家懷疑受到極權政府指揮的政治化的公共公司。由於香港政黨和法律界的腐敗，令港鐵公司在元朗黑幫進入車廂打人的一役，在容許警察進入地鐵站發射毒氣催淚彈的一役，逃過集體訴訟和大賠償的劫難（財閥請放心，民主派籌款的二千萬元不會用來打這種官司的）。如果港鐵維持之前的政府國營的身份，運輸署長早要被革職了，但外判的、假扮公司化的身份，令港鐵可以扮商業公司的無辜至今，甚至可以申請禁制令，禁止示威者進入。政府部門是無法申請禁制令的，有示威只能硬食，這就是外判公司化有利極權統治的道理。香港在九十年代的公共服務外判化，正正就是今日的極權統治的準備，於是，大家見到港鐵、機場和醫院都不能夠提供可靠而中立的公共服務，變成極權政府的打手。如果地鐵、九鐵、機場、學校及醫院的員工依然是終身聘用的公務員，他們不會好像現在那麼怕事、那麼投共。 這家看來已經政治化經營的公共公司，在中國和外國都有營運，香港總部的公司行為，是影響盈利和公司信譽的。如果各位是港鐵公司的股份持有人，絕對有權在董事會提出問責。如果大家發現港鐵公司在海外有營運分部，應該通知這些國家的交通部門及國會議員。 這就是香港國際城邦的鬥爭策略。我們是先進的、專業的、精細的，與國際理性世界聯繫的，而共產黨只是懂得指揮黑警察、黑社會、黑部門。只要我們掌握了一百七十幾年的先進城邦經營，那些來自山寨窯洞的共產黨土匪不是我們的對手，最終他們會讓出香港給我們自治。之後，我們在香港統治共產黨，好似以前英治政府（1842-1997）一樣，在香港統治共產黨，治得貼貼伏伏，賓主盡歡。 香港的公營公司的個案，值得寫給美國貿易談判當局知道，令美國醒覺，如果不在香港推行普選，香港如果不再跟隨國際的理性管理標準，香港將會是中共向外擴張極權統治的合法樞紐。 ——抱歉，這篇是學術文章，有點難讀，但香港的反抗就是要有點學問才可以成功，我們不是與共產黨玩泥漿摔角的，不要跟共產黨同一個level玩。陳雲的《港式新自由主義霸權》的書稿。
